name: quirkbot-compiler
author: Quirkbot
description: Cloud service that compiles Quirkbot programs.

scripts.shrink: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install --production
scripts.deploy:worker:stage: git checkout develop && eb deploy quirkbot-compiler-worker-stage
scripts.deploy:worker:production: git checkout master && eb deploy quirkbot-compiler-worker-production
scripts.deploy:web:stage: git checkout develop && eb deploy quirkbot-compiler-web-stage
scripts.deploy:web:production: git checkout master && eb deploy quirkbot-compiler-web-production
scripts.deploy:production: npm run deploy:web:production && npm run deploy:worker:production
scripts.deploy:stage: npm run deploy:web:stage && npm run deploy:worker:stage
